title: News Topics Character Limit
body: To edit the character limit on your homepage topics, edit [this](https://github.com/NamelessMC/Nameless/blob/a75bc52f4b1bc0be19ec57bff9c018e84f038aad/core/classes/Core/Util.php#L273) line in `core/classes/Core/Util.php` and change the `750` value to the value you wish.
